title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining large-scale migration planning with agentic AI (MAM226)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用智能体AI重新构想大规模迁移规划 (MAM226)
abstract: Dive deep into strategies for planning your large-scale AWS migration. In this session, we'll explore how to use AWS Transform and AI agents to accelerate your discovery, assessment, and planning for large-scale migrations. We will show you how planning migrations in spreadsheets is a thing of the past and how AI agents remove the heavy manual work of curating discovery data, building a business case, and planning a migration.
abstract_cn: 深入探讨规划大规模 AWS 迁移的策略。在本次会议中，我们将探索如何使用 AWS Transform 和 AI 代理来加速大规模迁移的发现、评估和规划。我们将向您展示在电子表格中规划迁移已成为过去，以及 AI 代理如何消除整理发现数据、构建业务案例和规划迁移的繁重手动工作。
